name: Rock Werchter

config_properties.name: Rock Werchter
config_properties.description: Belgium's largest annual rock music festival, held in Werchter since 1974, featuring major international artists.

ai_profile:
**Rock Werchter 2026: A Celebration of Genre-Spanning Talent**

Rock Werchter returns from July 2–5, 2026, with a stellar lineup of 29 artists representing a rich tapestry of genres. With a strong focus on rock and its many offshoots, the festival features a notable presence of Indie Rock (6 acts) and Alternative Rock (5 acts), complemented by a diverse mix of Electronic, Pop, Hip-Hop, and Soul acts. This genre diversity ensures something for everyone, from fans of dreamy, atmospheric sounds to those who thrive on hard-hitting beats and raw energy.

The festival showcases a global lineup, with a heavy presence from the USA (12 acts) and the UK (11 acts), alongside talents from Belgium, Canada, Germany, and Australia. While the lineup is predominantly male (22 artists), there is representation from female and non-binary performers, as well as acts with mixed-gender members, reflecting a step toward greater inclusivity. Two artists of color add to the festival’s cultural breadth, contributing to its rich tapestry of sounds and perspectives.

With every act rated and an impressive average rating of 7.76, Rock Werchter 2026 promises high-quality performances across the board. Over half of the artists boast ratings of 8 or higher, ensuring a memorable experience for attendees. With all acts featuring Spotify links, fans can get a head start on exploring the lineup before the festival kicks off. Prepare for four days of world-class music and unforgettable moments in the heart of Belgium!
